articles.title: Man arrested in Somerville fire that destroyed home under construction
articles.description:
The man, who is currently unhoused, was arrested for Wanton destruction of property and breaking and entering a building in the nighttime, police said. 

The post Man arrested in Somerville fire that destroyed home under construction appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Man arrested for arson in Somerville, causing destruction of a home under construction.
Suspect, currently unhoused, faces charges of wanton destruction and breaking and entering.
Local residents concerned about safety and property damage in the neighborhood.

articles.title: Bill Belichick reportedly bans Patriots scouts from UNC practices
articles.description:
“If you’re a scout from the New England Patriots, you are not allowed at the University of North Carolina. Which is funny, but also kind of embarrassing."

The post Bill Belichick reportedly bans Patriots scouts from UNC practices appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bill Belichick bans Patriots scouts from attending UNC football practices.

articles.title: Mass. schools placed in lockdown due to hunter with unloaded gun, police say
articles.description:
The person told police they had been legally hunting, and were carrying an unloaded firearm while returning to their car. 

The post Mass. schools placed in lockdown due to hunter with unloaded gun, police say appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts schools were placed in lockdown due to a hunter with an unloaded gun.
The incident occurred on September 4, 2025, near local schools.
Police confirmed the hunter was legally carrying the firearm while returning to their car.

articles.title: Here’s what to know about the HHS demand that Mass. erase ‘gender ideology’ from sex ed materials
articles.description:
The Trump administration flagged several “problematic” examples from Massachusetts’ materials, including references to gender identity and pronouns.

The post Here’s what to know about the HHS demand that Mass. erase ‘gender ideology’ from sex ed materials appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts faces federal pressure to remove gender identity references from sex education materials.

Failure to comply may jeopardize federal funding for Massachusetts schools.
